SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
The main application class for the Ping Pong game.
BallController
The BallController class manages the ball logic in the game.
BallModel
Model representing the properties and behavior of the game ball.
BallView
The visual representation of the game ball.
EndView
The view displayed at the end of the game, showing the winner, loser, and a play again button.
GameController
The GameController class manages the game logic, including players, rackets, ball, and game state.
GameControlsController
The GameControlsController class manages the game controls in the game.
GameControlsView
The GameControlsView containing controls view for the game : PLAY, PAUSE, RESTART.
GameModel
The model representing the game state and settings.
GameView
The view for playing the Ping Pong Game, including rackets, ball, and player information.
MainController
Controller responsible for managing the main flow of the game.
MainController.MainState
Enum representing the different states of the main application.
MainView
The main view of the Ping Pong Game application, managing the display of different game views.
PlayerController
The PlayerController class manages the player logic in the game.
PlayerModel
Model representing the properties and state of a player in the game.
PlayerModel.PlayerSide
Enumeration representing the player's side (LEFT or RIGHT).
PlayerView
The visual representation of a player's information, including name and score.
RacketController
The RacketController class manages the behavior of the rackets in the game.
RacketModel
Model representing the properties and state of a racket in the game.
RacketView
The visual representation of a racket in the game.
SettingsController
Controller responsible for handling game settings.
SettingsView
The view responsible for displaying the game settings.
TopBarController
The TopBarController class manages the top bar layout in the game.
TopBarView
The top bar view containing menus for game and player settings.
WelcomeView
The view responsible for displaying the welcome screen of the Ping Pong Game.
